events.message: The claimant reported a vehicle collision that occurred on May 9, 2024, involving significant front-end damage to their car.
Upon review, the claim was categorized under Auto Accident as it involves a car collision with another vehicle.
An insurance agent was assigned to handle the case and coordinate the claim processing communication with the claimant.
The claimant was notified that the insurance company has acknowledged receipt of the claim and will proceed with an investigation.
The claimant was asked to submit photos of the damaged vehicle and a police report for further assessment.
The claimant submitted the requested police report along with several photographs showing the extent of the vehicle damage.
The investigation team began reviewing the documents and photos provided to verify the details of the accident claim.
The investigation concluded confirming the damage was consistent with the claimant's description and police report.
A settlement offer was proposed to the claimant covering vehicle repair costs less deductible as per policy terms.
The claimant provided positive feedback appreciating the timely investigation and clear communication on the settlement.
The claim was formally approved following the claimant's acceptance of the proposed settlement terms.
Payment for the approved claim amount was issued directly to the claimant's bank account as agreed.
The claim has been officially closed after successful payment and confirmation of repair commencement by the claimant.
All documentation and records related to the auto accident claim were archived for future reference and auditing purposes.
